item.title: Creating code chunks
item.description: MathJax.Hub.Config({ TeX: { equationNumbers: {autoNumber: "all"} } }); Testing code chunk outputs The below code should be highlighted. require(plotly) ## Loading required package: plotly ## Loading required package: ggplot2 ## ## Attaching package: 'plotly' ## The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': ## ## last_plot ## The following object is masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter ## The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': ## ## layout gdf <- data.
